# Requify Design System

A professional, customizable design system built with Svelte 5, Tailwind CSS, and bits-ui primitives. Includes 60+ accessible, type-safe UI components.

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: Svelte 5 with runes-based reactivity ($props, $state, $derived, $effect)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 4 with CSS custom properties for theming
- **Primitives**: bits-ui v2 for accessibility-first headless components
- **Icons**: @lucide/svelte for consistent iconography
- **TypeScript**: Strict mode with comprehensive type definitions
- **Date Handling**: @internationalized/date for date components

## Installation

```bash
npm install @requify/requify-design-system
# or
yarn add @requify/requify-design-system
# or
bun add @requify/requify-design-system
```

## Quick Start

```typescript
// Import components and enums
import { Button, Card, Input } from '@requify/requify-design-system';
import { ButtonVariant, ComponentSize } from '@requify/requify-design-system';
```

```svelte
<script lang="ts">
  import { Button, Card, Input, Label } from '@requify/requify-design-system';
  import { ButtonVariant } from '@requify/requify-design-system';

  let inputValue = '';
</script>

<Card variant="default">
  <h3>Example Card</h3>
  <Label for="input">Enter text:</Label>
  <Input id="input" bind:value={inputValue} placeholder="Type something..." />
  <Button variant={ButtonVariant.PRIMARY}>Submit</Button>
</Card>
```

## Available Components

### Foundation Components

#### Button
Clickable button with multiple visual variants (primary, secondary, outline, ghost, danger, success) and sizes (xs, sm, md, lg, xl). Supports loading state, icons, and full-width. Wraps bits-ui.Button.Root.

**Props:**
- `variant`: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'outline' | 'ghost' | 'danger' | 'success' (default: 'primary')
- `size`: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' (default: 'md')
- `loading`: boolean (default: false)
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `fullWidth`: boolean (default: false)
- `icon`: Snippet (icon slot)
- `children`: Snippet (button content)
- `onclick`: (e: MouseEvent) => void
- `href`: string (renders as link if provided)
- `type`: 'button' | 'submit' | 'reset' (default: 'button')

**Accessibility:** Keyboard navigation (Enter, Space), visible focus ring, ARIA button role.

#### Card
Container component with variants for different visual styles. Can render as link when href provided.

**Props:**
- `variant`: 'default' | 'bordered' | 'elevated' | 'flat' | 'glass' (default: 'default')
- `size` | `padding`: 'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' (default: 'md')
- `hoverable`: boolean (default: false)
- `href`: string (renders as <a> if provided)
- `children`: Snippet

#### Input
Text input with error states, left/right icon slots, clearable option, and size variants.

**Props:**
- `size`: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' (default: 'md')
- `error`: string (displays error message below input)
- `clearable`: boolean (shows X button to clear value, default: false)
- `left`: Snippet (left icon slot)
- `right`: Snippet (right icon slot)
- `children`: Snippet<[HTMLInputAttributes]> (custom input rendering)
- `value`: string (bindable)
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `id`: string (for label association)

**Accessibility:** Proper label association via for/id attributes, error state with ARIA, keyboard navigation.

#### Label
Form label component with proper for/id attribute handling for accessibility.

**Props:**
- `for`: string (id of associated input)
- `required`: boolean (shows asterisk, default: false)
- `children`: Snippet

#### Badge
Small status indicator with semantic colors and dismissible option. Can render as link.

**Props:**
- `variant`: 'default' | 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error' | 'info' | 'orange' (default: 'default')
- `size`: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' (default: 'md')
- `dismissable`: boolean (shows X button, default: false)
- `onclose`: () => void (callback when dismissed)
- `href`: string (renders as link if provided)
- `children`: Snippet

#### Spinner
Loading spinner for async operations. Simple, animated loading indicator.

#### ButtonGroup
Groups buttons together with proper spacing and visual connection.

#### CloseButton
Pre-styled close button (X icon) for modals and panels.

### Form Components

#### Checkbox
Boolean input with checked/unchecked/indeterminate states. Wraps bits-ui.Checkbox.Root.

**Props:**
- `checked`: boolean (bindable)
- `indeterminate`: boolean (tri-state, bindable, default: false)
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `required`: boolean (default: false)
- `name`: string
- `value`: string
- `id`: string (for label association)
- `onCheckedChange`: (checked: boolean | 'indeterminate') => void
- `children`: Snippet (label content)

**Accessibility:** Native checkbox keyboard support, label association, indeterminate state ARIA.

#### Switch
Toggle switch with variants (primary, secondary, success, error, warning) and sizes (sm, md, lg).

**Props:**
- `checked`: boolean (bindable)
- `variant`: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'success' | 'error' | 'warning' (default: 'primary')
- `size`: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' (default: 'md')
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `id`: string
- `label`: Snippet

**Accessibility:** Keyboard toggle (Enter, Space), visible focus ring, ARIA switch role.

#### Select
Dropdown select with keyboard navigation and custom styling. Wraps bits-ui.Select.Root.

**Props:**
- `value`: string | number | null (bindable)
- `options`: SelectOption[] (array of { value, label, disabled })
- `placeholder`: string (default: 'Select an option')
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `required`: boolean (default: false)
- `error`: string
- `onChange`: (value: string | number | null | undefined) => void
- `children`: Snippet (custom option rendering)
- `id`: string

**Interface:**
```typescript
interface SelectOption {
  value: string | number | null;
  label?: string;
  disabled?: boolean;
}
```

**Accessibility:** Full keyboard navigation, ARIA combobox, screen reader support.

#### SelectItem
Individual select option item for custom rendering in Select.

#### RadioGroup
Radio button group with keyboard navigation. Wraps bits-ui.RadioGroup.Root.

**Props:**
- `value`: string (bindable)
- `orientation`: 'horizontal' | 'vertical' (default: 'horizontal')
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `name`: string
- `required`: boolean (default: false)
- `onChange`: (value: string) => void
- `children`: Snippet (RadioItem components)

#### RadioItem
Individual radio button item for RadioGroup.

**Props:**
- `value`: string
- `disabled`: boolean
- `label`: Snippet

#### Datepicker
Date selection component with custom styling and keyboard support. Uses @internationalized/date.

**Props:**
- `value`: Date | undefined (bindable)
- `placeholder`: string
- `disabled`: boolean
- `required`: boolean
- `error`: string
- `id`: string
- `label`: Snippet

**Accessibility:** Full keyboard date navigation, ARIA datepicker role, screen reader friendly.

#### DateRangePicker
Date range selection with validation. Uses @internationalized/date.

**Props:**
- `value`: { start?: Date; end?: Date } (bindable)
- `placeholder`: string
- `disabled`: boolean
- `required`: boolean
- `error`: string
- `id`: string
- `label`: Snippet

#### Search
Search input with icon and clearable functionality. Extends Input with search-specific styling.

**Props:**
- Same as Input, plus search-specific defaults and styling.

### Navigation Components

#### Sidebar
Collapsible sidebar navigation with groups. Complex navigation component with nested structure.

**Props:**
- `open`: boolean (collapsed state)
- `width`: string (default: '250px')
- `collapsedWidth`: string (default: '64px')
- `children`: Snippet

#### SidebarWrapper
Container for sidebar with proper layout and transitions.

#### SidebarGroup
Groups sidebar items together with optional label.

#### SidebarItem
Individual sidebar navigation item with active state and icon support.

#### SidebarDropdown
Dropdown menu within sidebar for nested navigation.

#### Tabs
Tabbed interface with keyboard navigation. Wraps bits-ui.Tabs.Root.

**Props:**
- `value`: string (active tab, bindable)
- `onValueChange`: (value: string) => void
- `children`: Snippet (TabsList, TabsContent components)

**Accessibility:** Left/Right arrow navigation, Tab/Shift+Tab to focus list, Enter/Space to activate.

#### TabsList
Container for tab triggers with visual selection indicator.

#### TabsTrigger
Individual tab trigger button.

**Props:**
- `value`: string (tab identifier)
- `disabled`: boolean
- `children`: Snippet (tab label)

#### TabsContent
Content panel for each tab.

**Props:**
- `value`: string (must match trigger value)
- `children`: Snippet (tab content)

#### Breadcrumb
Hierarchical navigation trail for showing page hierarchy.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet (BreadcrumbItem components)

#### BreadcrumbItem
Individual breadcrumb item with separator and link.

**Props:**
- `href`: string
- `current`: boolean (if true, renders as text, not link)
- `children`: Snippet

#### Accordion
Collapsible content panels with keyboard navigation. Wraps bits-ui.Accordion.Root.

**Props:**
- `type`: 'single' | 'multiple' (default: 'single')
- `value`: string | string[] (open item(s), bindable)
- `onValueChange`: (value: string | string[]) => void
- `collapsible`: boolean (default: true)
- `children`: Snippet (AccordionItem components)

**Accessibility:** Space/Enter to toggle, arrow keys between items, ARIA expanded states.

#### AccordionItem
Individual accordion panel with header and content.

**Props:**
- `value`: string (item identifier)
- `disabled`: boolean
- `title`: Snippet (accordion header)
- `children`: Snippet (accordion content)

#### Dropdown
Dropdown menu with keyboard navigation. Wraps bits-ui.DropdownMenu.Root.

**Props:**
- `open`: boolean (bindable)
- `align`: 'start' | 'center' | 'end' (default: 'start')
- `trigger`: Snippet (trigger element, required)
- `children`: Snippet (DropdownItem, DropdownDivider, DropdownHeader, DropdownLink)

**Accessibility:** Arrow key navigation, Space/Enter to select, Escape to close, focus trap.

#### DropdownItem
Individual dropdown menu item.

**Props:**
- `disabled`: boolean
- `onSelect`: () => void
- `children`: Snippet

#### DropdownDivider
Visual separator between dropdown sections.

#### DropdownHeader
Header text for dropdown sections.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet

#### DropdownLink
Dropdown item that renders as link.

**Props:**
- `href`: string
- `disabled`: boolean
- `children`: Snippet

#### Pagination
Pagination controls for data sets. Supports page numbers, next/prev, and page size selection.

**Props:**
- `currentPage`: number (bindable)
- `totalPages`: number
- `onPageChange`: (page: number) => void
- `showSizeSelector`: boolean (default: false)
- `pageSize`: number (default: 10)
- `onPageSizeChange`: (size: number) => void

### Feedback Components

#### Alert
Informational message with variants (info, success, warning, error) and dismissible option.

**Props:**
- `variant`: 'info' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error' (default: 'info')
- `dismissible`: boolean (shows X button, default: false)
- `onDismiss`: () => void
- `icon`: Snippet (custom icon, defaults to variant icon)
- `children`: Snippet (alert message)

**Accessibility:** role="alert", ARIA live region, dismiss button with aria-label.

#### Toast
Temporary notification with positioning and variant options.

**Props:**
- `open`: boolean (bindable)
- `variant`: 'info' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error'
- `position`: 'top-left' | 'top-center' | 'top-right' | 'bottom-left' | 'bottom-center' | 'bottom-right'
- `duration`: number (auto-dismiss in ms, 0 for manual)
- `title`: string
- `description`: string
- `action`: Snippet
- `onClose`: () => void

**Accessibility:** role="status", ARIA live region, keyboard dismissible.

#### ToastProvider
Context provider for toast management and positioning.

#### Modal
Dialog modal with backdrop and keyboard dismissal. Wraps bits-ui.Dialog.Root.

**Props:**
- `open`: boolean (bindable)
- `size`: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' | 'full' (default: 'md', max-widths: 384px, 448px, 768px, 1280px, 100%)
- `dismissible`: boolean (default: true)
- `outsideclose`: boolean (click outside to close, default: true)
- `title`: string
- `description`: string
- `children`: Snippet (modal content)
- `footer`: Snippet (modal footer)
- `header`: Snippet (custom header)
- `onClose`: () => void
- `form`: boolean (renders as form element)
- `onsubmit`: (e: SubmitEvent) => void

**Accessibility:** Focus trap, Escape to close, ARIA dialog role, proper focus management.

#### AlertDialog
Alert dialog for critical confirmations (destructive actions, warnings). Wraps bits-ui.Dialog.

**Props:**
- Similar to Modal, but optimized for confirmations with destructive implications.
- Has built-in action/cancel button slots.

**Accessibility:** role="alertdialog", ARIA described-by for dangerous actions, focus on primary action.

#### Drawer
Slide-out panel from screen edge with backdrop and transitions.

**Props:**
- `open`: boolean (bindable)
- `placement`: 'left' | 'right' | 'top' | 'bottom' (default: 'left')
- `backdrop`: boolean (default: true)
- `transitionParams`: Partial<FlyParams> (custom transition)
- `children`: Snippet

**Accessibility:** Focus trap, Escape to close, ARIA dialog role, smooth transitions.

#### Tooltip
Hover tooltip with positioning options. Wraps bits-ui.Tooltip.Root.

**Props:**
- `content`: string | Snippet (tooltip text or rich content)
- `children`: Snippet (trigger element, required)
- `side`: 'top' | 'right' | 'bottom' | 'left' (default: 'top')
- `align`: 'start' | 'center' | 'end' (default: 'center')
- `delayDuration`: number (ms before showing, default: 200)
- `disableHoverableContent`: boolean

**Accessibility:** role="tooltip", ARIA described-by, keyboard accessible, screen reader friendly.

#### Popover
Positioned popover with manual trigger control. Wraps bits-ui.Popover.Root.

**Props:**
- `open`: boolean (bindable)
- `side`: 'top' | 'right' | 'bottom' | 'left'
- `align`: 'start' | 'center' | 'end'
- `trigger`: Snippet (trigger element)
- `children`: Snippet (popover content)

**Accessibility:** Focus trap when open, Escape to close, ARIA attributes.

### Data Display Components

#### Table
Data table with sortable headers and responsive design.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet (TableHead, TableBody components)

#### TableHead
Table header container with sorting support.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet (TableHeadCell components)

#### TableHeadCell
Individual table header cell with sort indicators.

**Props:**
- `sortable`: boolean
- `sorted`: 'asc' | 'desc' | null
- `onSort`: () => void
- `children`: Snippet

#### TableBody
Table body container for rows.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet (TableBodyRow components)

#### TableBodyRow
Individual table row with hover states.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet (TableBodyCell components)

#### TableBodyCell
Individual table data cell.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet

#### Progressbar
Linear progress indicator with variants.

**Props:**
- `value`: number (0-100)
- `variant`: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'success' | 'error' | 'warning' | 'info' (default: 'primary')
- `size`: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' (default: 'md')
- `showLabel`: boolean (show percentage text, default: false)
- `animate`: boolean (striped animation, default: false)

**Accessibility:** role="progressbar", ARIA value attributes, screen reader friendly.

#### Listgroup
Styled list for content groups and navigation.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet (ListgroupItem components)

#### ListgroupItem
Individual list item with active state and link support.

**Props:**
- `active`: boolean
- `href`: string
- `disabled`: boolean
- `onclick`: (e: MouseEvent) => void
- `children`: Snippet

#### StepIndicator
Visual step progress indicator for multi-step workflows.

**Props:**
- `currentStep`: number
- `totalSteps`: number
- `steps`: string[] (step labels)
- `onStepClick`: (step: number) => void
- `clickable`: boolean (default: false)

#### Indicator
Badge indicator with flexible positioning (9 positions).

**Props:**
- `show`: boolean
- `placement`: 'top-left' | 'top-center' | 'top-right' | 'center-left' | 'center' | 'center-right' | 'bottom-left' | 'bottom-center' | 'bottom-right'
- `offset`: { x: number; y: number } (pixel offset, default: { x: 0, y: 0 })
- `content`: Snippet
- `children`: Snippet (parent element)

#### Spinner
Circular loading spinner with size variants.

**Props:**
- `size`: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' (default: 'md')
- `color`: string (CSS color value)

#### ListPlaceholder
Skeleton placeholder for list items with shimmer effect.

**Props:**
- `count`: number (number of items, default: 3)
- `height`: string (item height, default: '48px')

#### WidgetPlaceholder
Skeleton placeholder for cards/widgets with shimmer effect.

**Props:**
- `height`: string (default: '200px')
- `showHeader`: boolean (default: true)
- `showFooter`: boolean (default: false)

### Typography Components

#### Heading
Semantic heading component with size variants.

**Props:**
- `level`: 'h1' | 'h2' | 'h3' | 'h4' | 'h5' | 'h6' (HTML tag)
- `size`: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'base' | 'lg' | 'xl' | '2xl' | '3xl' (text size, default: 'lg')
- `weight`: 'normal' | 'medium' | 'semibold' | 'bold' (default: 'semibold')
- `color`: 'default' | 'muted' | 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error' (default: 'default')
- `children`: Snippet
- `id`: string (for anchor links)

#### P
Paragraph text component with size and color variants.

**Props:**
- `size`: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'base' | 'lg' | 'xl' | '2xl' | '3xl' (default: 'base')
- `weight`: 'normal' | 'medium' | 'semibold' | 'bold' (default: 'normal')
- `color`: 'default' | 'muted' | 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error' (default: 'default')
- `leading`: 'tight' | 'normal' | 'relaxed' (line-height)
- `children`: Snippet

#### A
Styled link component with hover states.

**Props:**
- `href`: string
- `external`: boolean (shows external icon, default: false)
- `variant`: 'default' | 'primary' | 'muted' (default: 'primary')
- `children`: Snippet

#### Blockquote
Styled blockquote for quotes and testimonials.

**Props:**
- `variant`: 'default' | 'bordered' | 'elevated' (default: 'bordered')
- `cite`: string (attribution)
- `children`: Snippet

### Other Components

#### Img
Responsive image component with lazy loading and fallback.

**Props:**
- `src`: string
- `alt`: string (required for accessibility)
- `loading`: 'lazy' | 'eager' (default: 'lazy')
- `width`: number
- `height`: number
- `class`: string

**Accessibility:** Always requires alt text, lazy loading for performance.

#### Hr
Horizontal rule/separator with variants.

**Props:**
- `variant`: 'default' | 'dashed' | 'dotted' (default: 'default')
- `class`: string

#### Helper
Form helper text for additional context below inputs.

**Props:**
- `text`: string
- `error`: boolean (error color variant, default: false)

#### Toolbar
Toolbar container with grouping support.

**Props:**
- `align`: 'start' | 'center' | 'end' | 'space-between' (default: 'start')
- `orientation`: 'horizontal' | 'vertical' (default: 'horizontal')
- `children`: Snippet

#### ToolbarButton
Pre-styled button for toolbar use.

**Props:**
- Same as Button, with toolbar-specific defaults.

#### ToolbarGroup
Groups toolbar buttons with proper spacing.

**Props:**
- `children`: Snippet

## Enums Reference

### ButtonVariant
- PRIMARY, SECONDARY, OUTLINE, GHOST, DANGER, SUCCESS

### BadgeVariant
- DEFAULT, PRIMARY, SECONDARY, SUCCESS, WARNING, ERROR, INFO, ORANGE

### AlertVariant
- INFO, SUCCESS, WARNING, ERROR

### ToastVariant
- INFO, SUCCESS, WARNING, ERROR

### ProgressbarVariant
- PRIMARY, SECONDARY, SUCCESS, ERROR, WARNING, INFO

### CardVariant
- DEFAULT, BORDERED, ELEVATED, FLAT, GLASS

### ComponentSize
- XS, SM, MD, LG, XL

### ModalSize
- SM (384px), MD (448px), LG (768px), XL (1280px), FULL

### CardPadding
- NONE, SM, MD, LG, XL

### SwitchSize
- SM, MD, LG

### SwitchVariant
- PRIMARY, SECONDARY, SUCCESS, ERROR, WARNING

### HeadingTag
- H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6

### TextSize
- XS, SM, BASE, LG, XL, XXL, XXXL

### FontWeight
- NORMAL, MEDIUM, SEMIBOLD, BOLD

### TextColor
- DEFAULT, MUTED, PRIMARY, SECONDARY, SUCCESS, WARNING, ERROR

### Side
- TOP, RIGHT, BOTTOM, LEFT

### Align
- START, CENTER, END

### DrawerPlacement
- LEFT, RIGHT, TOP, BOTTOM

### IndicatorPlacement
- TOP_LEFT, TOP_CENTER, TOP_RIGHT, CENTER_LEFT, CENTER, CENTER_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_CENTER, BOTTOM_RIGHT

### ToastPosition
- TOP_LEFT, TOP_CENTER, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_CENTER, BOTTOM_RIGHT

### Orientation
- HORIZONTAL, VERTICAL

## Theming

All components use CSS custom properties for colors, allowing easy theming.

```css
:root {
  /* Override primary brand color */
  --color-primary-500: #your-brand-color;
  --color-primary-600: #your-darker-brand-color;

  /* Override secondary/accent colors */
  --color-secondary-500: #your-accent-color;

  /* Override semantic colors */
  --color-success-500: #your-green;
  --color-error-500: #your-red;
  --color-warning-500: #your-yellow;
  --color-info-500: #your-blue;
}
```

## Accessibility

All components follow WCAG AA/AAA guidelines:
- Keyboard navigation support
- Proper ARIA attributes
- Screen reader compatibility
- Focus management
- Color contrast (4.5:1 minimum)

## Composition Patterns

### Snippet API
Svelte 5 snippets allow flexible content composition:

```svelte
<Button icon>
  {#snippet icon()}
    <Search class="h-4 w-4" />
  {/snippet}
  Search
</Button>
```

### Component Grouping
```svelte
<ButtonGroup>
  <Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>
  <Button variant="primary">Confirm</Button>
</ButtonGroup>
```

### Form Composition
```svelte
<Card>
  <Label for="email">Email</Label>
 <Input id="email" error="Invalid email format" />
  <Helper text="We'll never share your email" />
</Card>
```

## Best Practices

1. **Always use TypeScript**: All props are strongly typed with interfaces
2. **Use enums for variants**: `ButtonVariant.PRIMARY` instead of strings
3. **Leverage snippets**: For icons, headers, footers, and custom content
4. **Accessibility first**: Always provide labels, alt text, and ARIA attributes
5. **Responsive design**: Use size variants for different screen sizes
6. **Dark mode**: All components support dark mode automatically
7. **Theming**: Override CSS variables instead of hardcoded colors

## Code Examples

### Button with Loading State
```svelte
<Button variant={ButtonVariant.PRIMARY} loading={isSubmitting}>
  {#snippet icon()}
    <Save class="h-4 w-4" />
  {/snippet}
  Save Changes
</Button>
```

### Form with Validation
```svelte
<Card variant="bordered">
  <Label for="name" required>Name</Label>
  <Input
    id="name"
    bind:value={name}
    error={errors.name}
    placeholder="Enter your name" />
</Card>
```

### Modal with Form
```svelte
<Modal
  bind:open={showModal}
  title="Create User"
  size={ModalSize.MD}>
  <Input label="Name" bind:value={userName} />
  <Input label="Email" bind:value={userEmail} />

  {#snippet footer()}
    <Button variant="outline" onclick={() => showModal = false}>
      Cancel
    </Button>
    <Button variant="primary" onclick={handleSave}>
      Create User
    </Button>
  {/snippet}
</Modal>
```

### Tabs with Content
```svelte
<Tabs value="overview">
  <TabsList>
    <TabsTrigger value="overview">Overview</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger value="settings">Settings</TabsTrigger>
  </TabsList>

  <TabsContent value="overview">
    <Heading level="h3">Overview</Heading>
    <P>Content goes here</P>
  </TabsContent>

  <TabsContent value="settings">
    <Heading level="h3">Settings</Heading>
    <P>Configuration options</P>
  </TabsContent>
</Tabs>
```

## Related Packages

- **bits-ui**: Headless primitives for accessibility
- **@lucide/svelte**: Icon components
- **@internationalized/date**: Date handling utilities
- **clsx**: Conditional class utility
- **tailwind-merge**: Tailwind class deduplication

## Support

- GitHub: https://github.com/requify/requify-design-system
- Issues: https://github.com/requify/requify-design-system/issues
- Docs: https://github.com/requify/requify-design-system#readme
